item.title: Michael Taiwo Scholarship: What Students Need to Know and How to Apply (2024)
item.description: The Michael Taiwo Scholarship primarily supports ambitious Nigerian students in pursuing graduate studies abroad. It provides financial aid for standardized tests (GRE, GMAT, TOEFL, IELTS) and graduate school application fees, along with mentoring. The scholarship also supports students from other countries but to a lesser extent, such as Ghana, Pakistan, and Bangladesh, facilitating university education in the USA, UK, Canada, Europe, and Australia. Summary Points for the 2024 Application Michael Taiwo Foundation is the host for the scholarship.
